app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/1999-4915/12/1/105/s1, Figure S1. Deletion of the reported NP oligomerization domain (NP-âˆ†OD) prevents NP oligomerization in cell culture; Figure S2. NP-NLuc variants express at similar concentrations; Figure S3. Optimization of NLuc-VP40 VLP assay; Figure S4. Electron microscopy of NP-R111 and NP-R111C VLPs; Figure S5. EBOV NP interacts with the adaptor protein 1 (AP-1) complex independent of the NP 111 allele; File S1. Key resources table; File S2. List of all proteins identified by co-immunoprecipitation tandem mass spectrometry (co-IP MS/MS), related to Figure S5A.
